channel.title: Error Handling on Hack Mongo
channel.description: Recent content in Error Handling on Hack Mongo

item.title: MongoDB Bulk Insert Error Handling
item.description: Half a year ago, I reported a MongoDB server bug: SERVER-29861. Yesterday, we effectively finally closed it. First, my thanks to Asya and the MongoDB dev team for the thorough discussion and exploration of this issue, which was ultimately concluded not to be a bug. I’m glad to see MongoDB dig deep until the issue reaches bottom. As someone who formerly maintained a large, widely used open-source project for several years, I know how difficult this can be.
